2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S10.text: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S11.text: To Timothy, my dearly beloved son: Grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S12.text: I thank God, whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience, that I have thee in remembrance in my prayers night and day without ceasing.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S13.text: I greatly desire to see thee, being mindful of thy tears, that I may be filled with joy

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S14.text: when I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee, which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois, and thy mother Eunice and,I am persuaded, is in thee also.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S15.text: Therefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God which is in thee through the putting on of my hands.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S16.text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S17.text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord, nor of me His prisoner; but be thou a partaker of the afflictions of the Gospel according to the power of God,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S18.text: who hath saved us and called us with a holy calling, not according to our works, but in accordance with His own purpose and grace, which was given to us in Christ Jesus before the world began,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S19.text: but is now made manifest by the appearing of our Savior Jesus Christ, who hath abolished death and hath brought life and immortality to light through the Gospel.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S110.text: For this I am appointed a preacher and an apostle and a teacher of the Gentiles,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S111.text: for which cause I also suffer these things; nevertheless I am not ashamed. For I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that He is able to keep that which I have committed unto Him against that Day.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S112.text: Hold fast to the form of sound words, which thou hast heard from me, in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S113.text: That good thing which was committed unto thee, keep, by the Holy Ghost who dwelleth in us.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S114.text: This thou knowest, that all those who are in Asia have turned away from me, among whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S115.text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus, for he often refreshed me and was not ashamed of my chains;

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S116.text: but when he was in Rome, he sought me out very diligently and found me.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S117.text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy from the Lord in that Day! And in how many things he ministered unto me in Ephesus,thou knowest very well.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S20.text: Thou therefore, my son, be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S21.text: And the things that thou hast heard from me among many witnesses, commit thou the same to faithful men who shall be able to teach others also.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S22.text: Endure thou therefore hardship as a good soldier of Jesus Christ.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S23.text: No man who warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life, that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S24.text: And if also a man strive for masteries, yet he is not crowned unless he strive lawfully.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S25.text: The husbandman who laboreth must be the first partaker of the fruits.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S26.text: Consider what I say, and the Lord give thee understanding in all things.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S27.text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my Gospel,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S28.text: wherein I suffer trouble as an evildoer, even unto bonds. But the Word of God is not bound.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S29.text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect’s sake, that they also may obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus, with eternal glory.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S210.text: It is a faithful saying: For if we be dead with Him, we shall also live with Him;

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S211.text: if we suffer, we shall also reign with Him. If we deny Him, He also will deny us;

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S212.text: if we believe not, yet He abideth faithful; He cannot deny Himself.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S213.text: Of these things put them in remembrance, charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit but to the subverting of the hearers.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S214.text: Study to show thyself approved unto God, a workman who needeth not to be ashamed, rightly dividing the word of truth.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S215.text: But shun profane and vain babblings, for they will increase unto more ungodliness,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S216.text: and their word will eat as doth a canker — among whom are Hymenaeus and Philetus,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S217.text: who concerning the truth have erred, saying that the resurrection is past already, and overthrowing the faith of some.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S218.text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal: “The Lord knoweth those who are His,” and, “Let every one who nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.”

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S219.text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver, but also of wood and of earth, and some to honor and some to dishonor.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S220.text: If a man therefore purge himself from these, he shall be a vessel unto honor, sanctified and meet for the Master’s use, and prepared for every good work.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S221.text: Flee also youthful lusts; but follow righteousness, faith, charity, and peace with those who call on the Lord out of a pure heart.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S222.text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid, knowing that they engender strifes.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S223.text: And the servant of the Lord must not engender strife, but be gentle unto all men, apt to teach, patient,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S224.text: in meekness instructing those in opposition. Perhaps God will give them repentance, that they may acknowledge the truth,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S225.text: and that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil, who are taken captive by him at his will.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S30.text: This know also: that in the last days perilous times shall come.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S31.text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S32.text: without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, without selfcontrol, fierce, despisers of those who are good,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S33.text: traitors, headstrong, haughty, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S34.text: having a form of godliness but denying the power thereof. From such turn away.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S35.text: For of this sort are those who creep into houses and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S36.text: ever learning and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S37.text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth — men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S38.text: But they shall proceed no further, for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S39.text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S310.text: persecutions, afflictions which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra — what persecutions I endured. But out of them all, the Lord delivered me.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S311.text: Yea, and all who will live a godly life in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S312.text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving and being deceived.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S313.text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing from whom thou hast learned them,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S314.text: and that from childhood thou hast known the Holy Scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S315.text: All Scripture is given by inspiration of God and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S316.text: that the man of God may be perfect, thoroughly equipped for all good works.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S40.text: I charge thee therefore before God and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at His appearing and His Kingdom:

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S41.text: preach the Word; be instant in season and out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S42.text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but having itching ears, they shall heap to themselves teachers in accordance with their own lusts.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S43.text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned toward fables.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S44.text: But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, fulfill thy ministry.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S45.text: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S46.text: I have fought a good fight; I have finished my course; I have kept the faith.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S47.text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness which the Lord, the righteous Judge, shall give me on that Day — and not to me only, but unto all those also who love His appearing.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S48.text: Use diligence to come shortly unto me,

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S49.text: for Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and has departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S410.text: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark and bring him with thee, for he is profitable to me for the ministry.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S411.text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S412.text: The cloak that I left at Troas with Carpus, when thou comest, bring with thee, and the books, but especially the parchments.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S413.text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil; the Lord reward him according to his works.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S414.text: Beware thou also of him, for he hath greatly withstood our words.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S415.text: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me. I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S416.text: Notwithstanding, the Lord stood with me and strengthened me, that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear. And I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S417.text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work and will preserve me unto His heavenly Kingdom, to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S418.text: Salute Prisca and Aquila and the household of Onesiphorus.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S419.text: Erastus remained at Corinth, but Trophimus I have left sick at Miletus.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S420.text: Try with diligence to come before winter. Eubulus greeteth thee, and Pudens and Linus and Claudia and all the brethren.

2-timothy2coOAF2dByWwsL1S421.text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit. Grace be with you. Amen.
